data.title: Lucky prospector finds huge gold nugget 177 Oz/5.5kg (Australia)
Algerian army airstrikes BP facility, killing 34 hostages.
In Kashmir, a nine year old ceasefire agreement between India and Pakistan is in danger of breaking down. We ignore it at our own peril.
Japan to build world's largest offshore wind farm - this July
Google to build £1bn UK headquarters at London's King's Cross
Scientists modify HIV proteins; engineer them to protect against AIDS

The Vietnemese governemnt will allow a wildlife sanctuary to stay open following a bid to close it to build a hotel. The sanctuary helps bears which had previously been held in cramp cages with a catheter fixed to their bile ducts, some for up to 30-years.
Defense attorney blames victim in India gang-rape, murder case: "I have not seen a single incident or example of rape with a respected lady."
Dozens of hostages killed in Algeria - Al Jazeera English
